dialogue.text: Fayruz sits on an amp, wiping sweat from her brow.

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: ...I know I'm the one who suggested going on tour, but this is a lot of work.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Fayruz, you put one suitcase into the van and then sat down.

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: My power is in my words and thoughts. I have no need for physical strength.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Are your words and thoughts going to get that amp packed?

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Not yet!! I need somewhere to sit!!!
